name: babel-plugin-app-decorators-style-precompile
description: babel plugin for app-decorators style decorator
author: Serkan Sipahi <serkan.sipahi@yahoo.de>

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && babel src -d lib --source-maps && rm -f lib/index.test.js
scripts.test: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir lib --source-maps && node lib/index.test.js
scripts.compile: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir lib --watch --source-maps
